app.title: AI Photo Editor - Polish
app.description:
‚ú® Unlimited effects, backgrounds, and templates for you to turn your edits into art!üéâ

AI Photo Editor: Your Best Free Photo Editing App

Supported by next-gen AI photo generator and state-of-the-art AI model, Polish delivers intuitive, easy-to-use photo editing tools that let you retouch your selfies, enhance photo quality, fix blurry or damaged photos, generate realistic AI portraits for your LinkedIn profile, and create viral visuals for your TikTok & Instagram posts. Whether you're refining your personal brand as an influencer, boosting your marketing efforts as a business owner, or capturing everyday creative moments, Polish is built for every creator - no skills needed.

Unlock your creativity with our all-in-one Free AI photo editor, packed with over 500+ stunning effects, filters for photos, AI templates, backgrounds, fonts, and more.

For Beginners & Everyday Creators
Quick, fun edits for daily snaps and instant social shares.
* Instantly fix blurry photos and enhance quality with AI photo enhancer in one tap‚Ä®
* Auto-crop or expand images for Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook in seconds‚Ä®* Remove unwanted objects, and remove people from photos with precision smartly
* Smooth skin, remove blemishes, and reshape face&body naturally‚Ä®
* Create stunning photo collages with up to 18 images
* Apply vibrant filters for food, travel, or selfies to make posts pop

For Influencers & Social Media Lovers
Viral content that grabs attention and drives engagement.
* Choose from 100+ filters, including Y2K, VHS, CCD, and Glitch‚Ä®
* Transform selfies into anime avatars or 3D action figures with cool poses and outfits instantly‚Ä®
* Add floating text, sparkle stickers, and Reels-ready captions‚Ä®
* Swap messy backgrounds for Bali beaches or minimalist studios‚Ä®
* Post your photos directly to Instagram, Facebook, and other platforms without watermarks

For Self-Starters & Small Business Owners
Zero-cost, batch-friendly tools to power your product photos and marketing assets.
* Batch edit product photos with clean white backgrounds‚Ä®
* Use pre-built templates for Amazon listings and holiday sales campaigns like Black Friday‚Ä®
* Erase distractions like shadows or photo bombers from product shots‚Ä®
* Generate compliant ID/passport photos with perfect lighting and sizing

For Pros & Creative Perfectionists
High-control, Ultra-HD tools for print-ready work.
* Blend and mix images to create unique artwork
* Add light effects like Bokeh and Lens Flare
* Blur backgrounds for a professional DSLR effect
* Resize and square photos for Instagram-worthy images

Why Choose Us?
* Powerful and easy-to-use editing tools
* AI-powered features for effortless editing
* Hundreds of filters, stickers, and frames
* Body and face retouching for a perfect look
* Collage maker for creating stunning photo stories

Download AI Photo Editor today and transform your photos into stunning works of art!

app.summary: AI photo editor with AI enhancer, pic collage maker & post maker for Insta reels

reviews.text: This is a great photo app. Sooo easy to use. Been using it for about 6 months on both an Samsung S22 Ultra and S10+. Both new and old phones are very responsive. Having the stylus to work with makes it even easier to do touch ups and create cool works. Has text features, filters and background erase and add options. All around well balanced app for the beginner and more advanced editor. I would recommend upgrading if you're going to use it often, it is worth not having to sit through the ads.

I'm really impressed with the free version of this. I may buy the full version in future. One helpful addition would be a more thorough tutorial for those who don't have any experience with various features. I don't quite know what some of the options do without trying them & then sometimes I lose an adjustment I did to my photo & can't get back to the previous change I had made without a complete reset & that's not the result I wanted. But otherwise it's great.

Pretty decent app. Layout is very nice. Kind of a learning curve, but once figured out, it's pretty easy to navigate. Recommend getting the paid upgrade. Yeah, a little steep in price, but well worth it imo as you get a bit more editing tools and support the company. Tip: If you're having trouble trying to ajust a layer while zooming, make the layer a sticker first, then you can zoom and adjust with ease. Runs decent on my low spec phone (Galaxy A15 5G). Overall, I highly recommend üëçüëç.

So far, so good. Has gotten what I need to get done done. I've only used it to crop & blur a couple spots on a pic. One ad popped up in the middle of cropping, like I was dragging the line down, and BAM! ad pops up. I was able to resume cropping my picture where the line was when the ad interrupted me, so at least I didn't have to start over. I could see that being extremely annoying, though. There are free features and premium features under each section, so I just use the free ones.

Honestly, this app is great. With some of the layouts and even just with the basic editing features, I've had people ask me how I managed to do that kind of stuff just on my phone. Yeah, there are ads, but they're usually way less than 10 seconds long, and the result is always worth the wait. If there's one feature I'd like, it's splicing full images together. Making a collage, pics have to be majorly cropped go fit in their templates. Aside from that, amazing app!

I would say the app itself is amazing. I dont mind the ads, I get it. It keeps the lights on and it's a free app. My gripe is how terribly functioning some of the ads are. Some are great. Play the 5-15sec whichever, close at the end. The Kwikshop or w.e one doesn't always produce a close tho. and I am forced to close the whole app to reset it. Some ads are just terrible to deal with, functionwise.
reviews.replyText: Hi DreadPages, so sorry for the ads. we understand how you think about advertisements. We will try to adjust the frequency if possible. If you have any questions, please email polish@inshot.com. thanks a lot.

reviews.text: I've been using this app for close to two years now ($4.99/yr premium for one year) on an almost daily basis. It has all the basics you'd want for quick photo edits and simple image manipulation. I don't have any real complaints as it suits its purpose very well. I do hope for its continued feature additions but those have been somewhat minimal and slow to roll out (there's my only complaint but it's not a big one!). Love the simplicity and glitch-free nature of this app.

UPDATE: If you're a beginner, a casual user, on a budget, this IS the BEST editing app available! I've tried them all. Yes, there's more advanced apps. BUT, I'm no professional & I don't make money on what I create. Paying $100+, a month is ridiculous. The free versions have ad's, watermarks, and limited use. This is well designed, easy to use & includes many features. The best part is it only cost me $8 a YEAR! I'm really hard to please & this app has surpassed my expectations. A MUST HAVE APP!
reviews.replyText: Sorry for the trouble. Do you mean there are problems with "text" function? We will check and try to solve the problem as soon as possible. We'd be grateful if you could give us some detailed information and some screenshots. Thank you.

reviews.text: It's not bad. It has a lot of unique filters, and some unique options to advance, or add to the photos. But I find that premium is too much, or many premium features should be free, because other apps have those options as free. It would be great to see them cut down on making basic features as premium features, so that people wouldn't have to download many apps to create what they're trying to achieve.

I've tried a few photo editor apps, and this one is very competent, and allows the ability to do basic layering of additional photos with transparency, a basic need for me that's seemingly hard to find on Android. The interface is also easy to use, as always with InShot products. They also make the best video editors on Android by far, so at this point, I trust them for any apps.

app.AIReview:
AI Photo Editor: Polish - A Comprehensive Review

Overview

AI Photo Editor: Polish is a free mobile application targeting users looking for robust photo editing capabilities, heavily leveraging Artificial Intelligence to simplify and enhance the creative process. With over 289 million installs and a remarkable 4.82 rating from nearly 5 million users, it‚Äôs clear that this app has garnered significant attention within the photography and social media landscape. The app's core proposition centers around delivering easy-to-use tools combined with AI-powered features for tasks ranging from basic photo enhancements to generating entirely new images ‚Äì a notable ambition given its free status. The app is categorized as Photography, reflecting its primary function, and boasts a visually appealing interface designed to be approachable even for users unfamiliar with complex editing software.

Key Features

Polish offers a remarkably diverse suite of features, broadly categorized as follows:

  • AI Photo Enhancer: This core feature utilizes AI to automatically improve photo quality, correcting brightness, contrast, sharpness, and color balance. The app claims to "fix blurry or damaged photos," which is a frequently sought-after capability.
  • AI Portrait Generator: A standout feature allowing users to generate realistic AI portraits based on text prompts. This is particularly targeted at professional networking platforms like LinkedIn, offering a quick way to create polished profile pictures. Users input information such as desired age, gender, hair color, and clothing style to influence the generated portrait.
  • Effects & Filters: A substantial collection of pre-designed filters and effects, ranging from vintage styles to modern gradients, providing immediate aesthetic transformations.
  • Backgrounds & Templates: Extensive library of backgrounds suitable for various purposes ‚Äì from creating Instagram stories to designing TikTok visuals. Integrated templates streamline the creation process for specific content formats.
  • Pic Collage Maker & Post Maker (for Insta Reels): Dedicated tools for creating collages and visually engaging posts optimized for platforms like Instagram Reels, including pre-sized templates and animated stickers.
  • Retouching Tools: Standard photo editing tools like cropping, rotating, brightness/contrast adjustments, saturation control, vignette effects, and selective adjustment brushes are included.
  • Text & Stickers: Ability to add text overlays with various fonts and styles, alongside a selection of stickers for decorative purposes.

Strengths

  • Powerful AI Capabilities: The AI Portrait Generator is genuinely impressive and represents a significant differentiator within the app‚Äôs category. Its ability to create believable portraits from textual descriptions demonstrates considerable technological advancement. The automatic photo enhancer also performs admirably, delivering noticeable improvements in many photos without requiring manual adjustments.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Despite offering a wealth of features, the app maintains an intuitive and easy-to-navigate interface. The layout is clean and logically organized, making it accessible to both novice and experienced users.
  • Versatile Functionality: The app caters to a broad range of user needs ‚Äì from quick photo enhancements to complex creative projects like generating AI portraits and designing social media content.
  • Large User Base & High Rating: The massive install count (289 million) and high rating (4.82) indicate significant popularity and positive user sentiment, suggesting a reliable and well-received product.
  • Free to Use: The app‚Äôs completely free model removes any barrier to entry for users curious about AI photo editing capabilities.

Areas for Improvement

  • AI Portrait Generation Limitations: While impressive, the AI portrait generator can occasionally produce results that are uncanny valley ‚Äì slightly off or unnatural-looking. Fine-tuning parameters and providing more specific prompts can improve accuracy but requires experimentation.
  • Template Overload: The sheer number of templates available could be overwhelming for new users. A more streamlined approach with curated categories would enhance usability.
  • Watermark (Potential): While the app is free, a prominent watermark on edited photos may deter some users from sharing their creations publicly. A paid premium version without watermarks should be considered.
  • Processing Times: AI-powered features can sometimes result in longer processing times, particularly when generating complex portraits or applying advanced enhancements to high-resolution images. Optimizing backend performance would improve user experience.
  • Limited Advanced Editing Controls: Compared to professional photo editing apps, Polish lacks some of the more sophisticated controls for color grading, layer masking, and advanced retouching techniques.

User Experience

The overall user experience is positive, largely due to the app‚Äôs intuitive design and seamless integration of AI features. The step-by-step process for using each feature is clearly guided, reducing the learning curve. The real-time preview functionality allows users to see immediate results as they make adjustments, fostering a more engaging editing workflow. The transition between different tools (e.g., applying a filter followed by adjusting brightness) feels fluid and responsive. However, the occasional lag during AI processing can be disruptive.

Value for Money

As a free application, Polish offers exceptional value. The core features ‚Äì including the AI photo enhancer and portrait generator ‚Äì are highly functional and deliver tangible improvements to photos. While premium versions offering additional features and watermark removal exist, they aren't strictly necessary for casual users. The app effectively provides a substantial suite of tools without requiring any financial commitment.

Conclusion

AI Photo Editor: Polish is a remarkably successful mobile application that demonstrates the growing potential of AI in creative workflows. Its strengths lie primarily in its powerful AI Portrait Generator and intuitive user interface, combined with a comprehensive feature set catering to diverse editing needs. While some limitations exist ‚Äì particularly around the AI portrait generation's consistency and occasional processing delays ‚Äì the app‚Äôs popularity and high rating are testament to its overall effectiveness and value. For anyone seeking an accessible and technologically advanced photo editor, especially those interested in exploring AI-powered creative tools, Polish is undoubtedly a worthwhile download. It provides a solid foundation for both casual users and aspiring social media content creators.
